entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 5:30 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening and ending before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 12 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023
